name: StatsFC Squad Selector
author: Will Woodward

sections.description:
Add a squad selector to your WordPress website. To request a key sign up for your free trial at statsfc.com.

For a demo, check out wp.statsfc.com/squad-selector.

Translations

  • Bahasa Indonesia
  • Dansk
  • Deutsch
  • Eesti
  • Español
  • Français
  • Hrvatski Jezik
  • Italiano
  • Magyar
  • Norsk bokmål
  • Slovenčina
  • Slovenski Jezik
  • Suomi
  • Svenska
sections.installation:
1. Upload the statsfc-squad-selector folder and all files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the widget through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Drag the widget to the relevant sidebar on the ‘Widgets’ page in WordPress
  4. Set the StatsFC key and squad ID. If you don’t have a key, sign up for free at statsfc.com

You can also use the [statsfc-squad-selector] shortcode, with the following options:

  • key (required): Your StatsFC key
  • squad (required): Your StatsFC squad ID
sections.changelog:
1.2.2

  • Hotfix: Check options exist before using them

1.2.1

  • Hotfix: Check the before/after widget/title bits exist before using them

1.2.0

  • Feature: Added multi-language support. If you’re interested in translating for us, please get in touch at hello@statsfc.com

1.1.0

  • Feature: Responsive (mobile-friendly) vertical Squad Selector

1.0.0

  • Feature: Initial widget release

short_description: This widget will place a bespoke squad selector on your website.
